args.subject: Summary of the client meeting
args.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. Here is a summary of our recent client meeting held on May 5, 2024:

Attendees from our company: Emma Johnson, David Lee
Attendees from your side: John Mitchell

Meeting Overview:
- We discussed your requirements for the new project.
- We agreed on the project timeline and key milestones.
- We reviewed the initial design concepts and gathered your feedback.

Action Items:
- Emma will update the project plan based on your feedback.
- David will coordinate with the development team to start the initial phase.

Please note that our next meeting is scheduled for June 1, 2024.

Best regards,
Emma Johnson
Blue Sparrow Tech
